Reviews.Title: Charger isn't American Standard
Reviews.Author: Carter Gillespie
Reviews.Content: I really wish charger style were listed in the description. This phone came with a charger that is not standard to the US, so we had to use an adapter.Haven't actually used the phone yet, so nothing to say on that front. It is super cute though!

ProductInfo.Features:
Product Identifiers, Brand Samsung, Family Line Samsung GT, Model E1080i, SIM Lock - Unlocked
Band - GSM 900/1800 (Dual Band)
Network Technology - GSM
Samsung GT E1080i dual-band phone
The slim and stylish Samsung GT E1080i dual-band phone is a rugged phone that offers durability and performance. This Samsung basic phone's 1.43-inch CSTN LCD display gives you a clear view of the menu and the applications. The phonebook feature in the Samsung GT E1080i stores up to 200 entries and about a 100 messages. This Samsung basic phone provides a talktime of 7 hours 30 minutes and a 550-hour standby time, allowing you to converse with your loved ones for long periods of time. This dual-band phone also has a mobile tracker that alerts the user when the SIM card is changed on a stolen handset. Personalize the Samsung GT E1080i with about 40 polyphonic and MP3 ringtones
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Guru GT E1081T Sim Free Unlocked Mobile Phone - Black
